archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
HRIS (Human Resource Information System)
Purpose: Centralizes all aspects of the employee lifecycle and workforce management.
Core Modules & Functions:
• Recruitment & Onboarding: Job requisitions, applicant tracking, offer letters, orientation workflows • Core HR: Employee records, organizational charts, time & attendance, leave management • Payroll & Benefits: Payroll processing, tax compliance, benefits enrollment and administration • Performance & Development: Goal setting, performance reviews, learning management, succession planning
Architecture & Integration:
• Often overlaps or integrates with ERP’s finance/payroll modules; exposes APIs for single sign-on (SSO) and workforce analytics • Integrates with time-clock systems and compliance modules (e.g., credentialing, licensure tracking)
Example Software Highlights:
• Workday HCM: Unified core HR with talent management, intuitive self-service, real-time reporting • Oracle PeopleSoft HCM: Deep global payroll capabilities, flexible benefits administration, role-based dashboard
